name: OR_CASE_COMMENTS
description: The OR_CASE_COMMENTS table contains OR management system case comments.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the case note entered for the case.

columns.name: CASE_NOTES
columns.description: The case notes entered for the case.
